name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: The extent of the attack had not fully been brought to the attention of Members who remained contained in the Capitol and Congressional office buildings, but the January 6, Committee will tell the American People the fragility of our Democracy nearly collapsed.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: I felt the fear and questioned the nation's survival, but we ultimately returned. I was most gratified to become Speaker Pro Temp and gaveled the joint session of the House and Senate out around 4:00 in the morning when the job of counting the electoral votes had been completed.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: As I fight for American Mothers and Mothers in Houston to get nourishing formula to feed their babies we must stop this catastrophic death march in East Africa where mothers, families and babies are dying. We must love our babies in America and all over the world.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: There are millions at risk of starvation in Kenya and East Africa if aid is not provided immediately.  I will seek aid from USAID, introduce an Emergency Supplemental, and pursue any emergency funding that can be provided right now to address this crisis.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: The people of Kenya and East Africa are dying from starvation.  #Oxfam and #SavetheChildren report that one person is likely dying of hunger every 48 seconds in drought-ravaged Ethiopia, Kenya and Somalia.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: The United States has to respond immediately by providing large shipments of grain, other essential foods, and Formula 100 and Formula 75 two therapeutic milk products designed to treat severe malnutrition in infants and young children to save tens of thousands of lives.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text:
It is the duty of the Senate to provide for a suspension of the filibuster when a vote concerns the integrity of our democracy and ensuring the rights enshrined in our Constitution!
#EndTheFilibuster https://t.co/3KLWP8PYKQ

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text:
I am encouraging the Senate to support the suspension of the filibuster to pass the desperately needed John Robert Lewis Voting Rights Enhancement Act of 2021 and the Freedom to Vote Act, now. 
#EndTheFilibuster

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text:
It is anathema to our democracy that the Constitutional rights held by the people can be curtailed by a procedural mechanism such as the filibuster that was created over a century ago. 

#EndTheFilibuster

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text:
For this reason, it is the duty of the Senate to provide for a suspension of the filibuster when a vote concerns the integrity of our democracy and ensuring the rights enshrined in our Constitution. 
#EndTheFilibuster

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text:
We can either protect the filibuster, an outdated and abused Jim Crow relic, or we can protect our democracy and deliver real results for the American people. 

#EndTheFilibuster

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text:
Rather, it is our obligation as Americans to make sure that each of us is free to vote and to have that vote counted as cast in free and fair elections.
3/3

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text:
I believe that this motto should be adopted as our national calling: Americans are Always Free. Our freedom is assured through the ballot box. It is not the job of any particular political party or interest group to secure and defend our freedom. 
2/3

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text:
In my letter to Senator Manchin, I told him that I believe that the West Virginia motto is as true today as it was at its first utterance: Mountaineers are Always Free. 
1/3

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text:
The impact of the Constitution and its basic premise can be summarized by the simple belief that every individual is entitled to an equally valid vote. 
#EndTheFilibuster https://t.co/qlMdqWMDGk

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text:
In my letter to Senator Manchin I implored him to recognize that safeguarding Voting Rights is our duty as elected officials. It is our moral obligation. It's voting rights or the filibuster. It is our democracy or the filibuster.
#EndTheFilibuster https://t.co/NeH8UsRRII

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: The #BuildBackBetter framework will set the United States on course to meet its climate targets—a 50-52% reduction in greenhouse gas emissions below 2005 levels by 2030—in a way that creates good-paying union jobs, grows domestic industries, and advances environmental justice.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: The framework will also provide a tax cut of up to $1,500 in tax cuts for more than 1.5 million low-wage workers in Texas by extending the American Rescue Plan’s Earned Income Tax Credit (EITC) expansion.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: The #BuildBackBetterAct framework extends the Child Tax Credit (CTC) increases of $300/month per child under 6 or $250/month per child ages 6 to 17. This will continue the largest one-year reduction in child poverty in history.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: Prior to the pandemic, 15% of children under the age of 18 in Texas lived in poverty. The #BuildBackBetter framework will bolster financial security and spur economic growth in Texas by reducing taxes on the middle class and those striving to break into it.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: #BuildBackBetter closes the Medicaid coverage gap, helping millions of Americans gain health insurance during a global pandemic!

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: The #BuildBackBetter framework will enable Texas to expand access to free, high-quality preschool to more than 588,286 additional 3- and 4-year-olds per year and increase the quality of preschool for children who are already enrolled.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: Texas families spend $9,428, or 21% of their income on child care for one year. The Build Back Better framework will enable Texas to provide access to childcare for 2,011,503 young children (ages 0-5) per year from families earning under 2.5 times the Texas median income.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: The #BuildBackBetter framework will be transformative for nearly every Texas family: delivering historic investments that meet their needs in the wake of the pandemic and will ensure that all can share in the benefits of a growing economy now, and for generations to come.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: Democrats’ Build Back Better framework – which we will soon enact into law – will deliver for Texas’ families, with millions of good-paying jobs, historic middle class tax cuts and lower costs, so parents can thrive and succeed.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: For far too long, Texas’ families have been held back by soaring costs – from childcare to health care to education to the climate crisis and more. To unleash the full potential of every worker and family in our state, Democrats must #BuildBackBetter.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: The #BuildBackBetter framework delivers transformative investments that will address these needs and finally unlock the full potential of Texas’ families, while also ensuring that the wealthiest and corporations pay their fair share.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: In the wake of the pandemic, skyrocketing costs of childcare, health care, home, and community-based care, early and higher education, housing, and more are hurting working families across Texas and around the nation.  We must #BuildBackBetter.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: Our Veteran's sacrifice their lives to protect our freedoms. They deserve the very best resources our nation has when they return home. I'm proud to work with my colleagues on @VetAfairsDems and @HASCDemocrats to pass legislation that will support and uplift them.

Ensure free and fair access to the ballot.
Protect the integrity of our elections.

End the era of big money in our politics.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: The #FreedomToVote Act strengthens our democracy against restrictive voter laws, gerrymandering and dark money right now. It works in tandem with the #JohnLewisVotingRightsAct to protect the voice of the people for generations to come.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text:
According to the U.S. Sentencing Commission, nearly 84% of the more than 2,000 marijuana offenders who were federally sentenced in 2018 were people of color. 

Only 11% were white, although nearly 60% of the U.S. population is white.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: In 2013, simple cannabis possession was the fourth most common cause of deportation for any offense and the most common cause of deportation for drug law violations.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: Black men receive drug sentences that are 13.1 percent longer than sentences imposed for White men and Latino are nearly 6.5 times more likely to receive a federal sentence for cannabis possession than non-Hispanic Whites.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text:
Thousands of men and women have suffered needlessly from the federal criminalization of marijuana, particularly in communities of color.

Here are the facts:

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: We must undo the damage that has been done to our communities since marijuana was arbitrarily placed on the list of controlled substances back in 1970. https://t.co/3SmTw8bebs

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: The continued enforcement of cannabis prohibition laws results in over 600,000 arrests annually, disproportionately impacting people of color who are almost four times more likely to be arrested for cannabis possession than their White counterparts, despite equal rates of use.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: 3. Expunge and seal Federal marijuana convictions and resentence offenders, as appropriate.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: 2. Sets up a taxation structure to collect a sales tax on marijuana, which would increase from five to eight percent over five years.

name: Sheila Jackson Lee
tweet_text: 1. Removes marijuana, or cannabis, from the list—or the schedule—of Federally controlled substances.
